name: TastyPlanet Back for SecondsHD
storyline: The story begins when the goo eats a time machine, sending him back in time. Playing as the goo, you'll travel to six different time periods and eat everything along the way. Eat rats, dinosaurs, gladiators, samurai, hovercars, pyramids, volcanoes... Everything!
summary: Control a tiny ball of grey goo with the ability to eat anything smaller than itself. The more it eats, the bigger it gets! Soon you'll be able to eat the entire planet!
